channel.title: preview on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in preview on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: workflowv3-convert
item.description: cdsctl preview workflowv3-convert Convert existing workflow to Workflow V3 files. Synopsis Convert existing workflow to Workflow V3 files. cdsctl preview workflowv3-convert [ PROJECT-KEY WORKFLOW-NAME ] [flags] Options --format string Specify export format (json or yaml) (default "yaml") --full Set the flag to export pipeline, application and environment content. Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers.

item.title: workflowv3-validate
item.description: cdsctl preview workflowv3-validate Parse and validate given Workflow V3 files. Synopsis Parse and validate given Workflow V3 files. cdsctl preview workflowv3-validate [ PROJECT-KEY ] YAML-FILE ... [flags] Options --silent Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -n, --no-interactive Set to disable interaction with ctl --verbose Enable verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl preview - CDS feature preview
